creator: marcos.rivera@intelygenz.com
text:
Hi,

There is a problem with Tomcat 6.x / 7.x for Windows that allows access to the WEB-INF folder when a "." is added at the end of WEB-INF in a URL

Example:

     http://www.somedomain.com/WEB-INF./web.xml

creator: markt@apache.org
text: Such URLs correctly return a 404 response with both 6.0.x and 7.0.x.
